column1: Westfold-men were the Men of Rohan who lived in the regions westward of Edoras
column2: in the lands beneath the White Mountains. At the time of the War of the Ring
column3: their commander was Erkenbrand. Many of them were lost in the Battles of the Fords of Isen
column4: but enough remained to form the bulk of the defence of Helms Deep when Sarumans forces attacked.
